thread.title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Reynolds American amends credit agreement
thread.title_full: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Reynolds American amends credit agreement | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Reynolds American amends credit agreement
text:
(Corrects headline to say "amends", not "enters into", credit agreement)
Oct 26 (Reuters) - Oct 26 (Reuters) - Reynolds American Inc : * On December 18, 2014, Reynolds American Inc entered into a credit agreement * Requested that maturity date of the credit agreement be extended by 12
months, from December 18, 2019 to December 18, 2020 * Source text for Eikon * Further company coverage
